title: Evaluate the Author
text: Check the author's credentials to ensure they are an expert in the field. 🧑‍🎓

title: Publication Date Matters
text: Ensure the source is up-to-date by checking the publication date. 📅

title: Consider the Publisher
text: Look at the publisher's reputation to assess the source's reliability. 🏢

hintAnswer: Check the author's credentials and the publication date.
title: Identify Key Practices
text: Which of the following is a good practice to ensure a source's credibility?
choices: Check the author's credentials and the publication date.
Rely on the number of pages in the document.
Use the source if it has a colorful design.
Trust the source if it has a lot of references.
